column2: Rabbitgoo Reflective No-Pull Dog Harness (Front & Back Clip) (Medium) | HappyPawsCo UK
column3:
If your dog turns every walk into a tug-of-war, this no-pull harness gives you a calmer, safer setup without putting pressure on their throat. It includes two lead attachment points (front and back), soft padding, and reflective detailing for darker walks.

Why you’ll love it

  • Two lead clips (front + back): Use the front clip to help reduce pulling during training. Use the back clip for everyday walks, jogging, and hiking.
  • No-choke design: A harness-style fit helps avoid pressure on the neck compared to collar-only walking.
  • Easy on and off: Overhead design with two quick-release buckles makes it simple to fit, remove, and adjust.
  • Comfort-first materials: Nylon oxford outer with soft padding, plus breathable mesh to help with airflow.
  • Reflective strips: Added visibility for early mornings, evenings, and winter walks.
  • Top control handle: Handy for extra control in busy spots, stairs, doorways, or when you need a steady moment.

Fit and adjustability

This harness includes four adjustment points (two at the neck and two at the chest) so you can dial in a secure fit with room for movement. A snug, well-adjusted fit helps reduce slipping and improves comfort on longer walks.

Sizing notes

Size L (manufacturer guidance): Neck girth 46–66 cm, chest girth 43–85 cm. Suitable for many medium-to-large dogs. Please check the size chart and measure your dog before ordering, as sizing can vary by build and coat.

Also available in Size M. Use your dog’s measurements and the size chart to choose the best fit.

How to measure

  • Neck: Measure around the base of the neck (not where a collar sits high up).
  • Chest: Measure the widest part of the ribcage, just behind the front legs.
  • Fit check: You should be able to slip two fingers under the straps comfortably.

Care

Wipe clean for day-to-day mess. For deeper cleaning, follow the care instructions and allow to fully air dry before next use.

Safety note

This harness is designed for walking and training. If you need in-car restraint, look for a dedicated car safety harness or restraint system designed specifically for vehicle use.

Need a different size? Shop Size L.

column2: Kurgo Enhanced Strength Tru-Fit Crash-Tested Dog Car Harness + Seatbelt Tether (Medium, Black)  | HappyPawsCo UK
column3:
If you want one harness that works for both everyday walks and safer car travel, this Kurgo Tru-Fit Enhanced Strength harness is a solid choice. It combines a broad padded chest plate for comfort with all-steel buckles and an included seatbelt tether for car journeys.

Key features

  • Dual-use design: Comfortable enough for daily walks, plus built for car restraint when used with the included tether.
  • Front and back lead points: Use the front D-ring to help reduce pulling, and the back attachment for everyday walking.
  • All-steel hardware: Steel nesting buckles and steel hardware for a more secure feel.
  • Seatbelt tether included: Comes with a 10-inch tether with an all-steel carabiner to help reduce driver distraction during travel.
  • Padded chest plate: Broad padded chest section designed to spread pressure more comfortably.

Using it in the car

For car travel, Kurgo recommends using the included carabiner tether to connect the harness to your vehicle seat belt system. Keep the tether short enough that your dog can sit and lie down comfortably, but not climb into the front seats.

Size & fit (Medium)

  • Neck: 40–63 cm
  • Chest: 46–71 cm
  • Recommended weight range: 11–23 kg

Measure neck and chest before ordering for the best fit. A snug fit helps the harness sit correctly without rubbing, while still allowing normal breathing and movement.

Care

Machine wash on a gentle cycle or hand wash, then line dry. Let it fully dry before storing, especially after wet winter walks.

Note: “Crash-tested” refers to manufacturer testing methods and does not mean UK legal certification. HappyPawsCo is a retailer of this product.
